definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (´[[י]] is firm, enduring);—Je 27:20 = [[יְכָנְ֫יׇהוּ]] Je 24:1 = [[יְכָנְיׇה]] Je 28:4, Je 29:2, 1Ch 3:16, 1Ch 3:17, Es 2:6 = [[כָּנְיׇ֫הוּ]] Je 22:24, Je 22:28, Je 37:1 (LXX Iexoniav throughout), all of last king but one of Judah, v. [[יְהוֹיׇכִין]] p. 220 supr.
